TopicTitle: Any 3.75m SAS and Remote Guidance Units?

Articles.Content:
I'm building an SLS Block II-type rocket and the one problem I've run into is a lack of stock SAS and RGU units for 3.75m diameter stacks.

I know I could edit the cfg's to make my own (and I may have to), but I was wondering if there's a mod that has these already.

Also, does any mod have better radial decouplers for larger boosters and such? The hydraulic manifolds don't space things away from the new fuel tanks as much as I'd like, and the other ones go out a bit too far for aesthetic purposes.
KW has radially attached 3.75m SAS which looks kinda nice, there's no stack SAS AFAIK.
NovaPunch has 3.75m SAS, decouplers, and RCS tanks (and a new 3.75m spacecraft is in public testing now )
Thanks, I'll give it a look. Perhaps I can find a comparably sized battery also.
Thank you! That was exactly everything I needed!

If you're still looking here, SpaceY redoes the really heavy rocketry and gives 3.75 probe cores and monoprop tanks. It also gives sizes 4-6, with size 4&5 probe cores. It also gives a Poodle-like 3.75m engine and more lifters, mostly in sizes 3-5 - size 6 has no engines, just a load of adapters.
